BOX.description: Instantiates the canonical MBC-4.0 Box object with all required semantic fields.

ROUTER.description: Applies polarity routing and logic-gate mapping inside the Box.

NORMALIZE.description: Enforces global invariant constraints and Ω-consistency.

EVAL.description: Evaluates a Box into a semantic value.

PROJECT.description: Projects the Box to its semantic image (form state).

DEVIATE.description: Applies deviation geometry and updates internal δ-state.

WEIGHT.description: Applies local metric weight and micro-adjacency updates.

CURVE.description: Applies curvature deformation and mode bending.

SUM.description: Contracts or reduces Box states across δ/Φ/Π layers.

STEP.description: Evolves the Box along the semantic time parameter χ.

FEDERATE.description: Embeds the Box into a meta-layer in the ρ-hierarchy.
